In an EUMS TL the multilingual element corresponding to the common URI reference "http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/schemerules/EUcommon" MUST have its xml:lang attribute set to value "en".

The value of the xml:lang attribute of Name is one of the values for European languages specified in IETF RFC 5646 and in clause E.1 of ETSI TS 119 612. Found value: "en"

ServiceName.Check: The value of the xml:lang attribute of one of the ServiceName-Name elements shall be 'en'. Found in ServiceName-Name[1]

X509Certificate.Check: The component X509Certificate must contain an X509 certificate.Suceeded to parse certificate in this component. Certificate details: Issuer: "C=DK,O=TRUST2408,CN=TRUST2408 OCES Primary CA". SubjectName: "C=DK,O=TRUST2408,CN=TRUST2408 OCES Primary CA". SerialNumber: 1267621891. Public Key's SHA1 digest: 'f66df8b148b3414301db8644e51805b75ecc0637'

The Trusted List MUST NOT contain two equal complete digital identities. A complete digital identity is a tuple formed by: a public key, the type of service owning the public key, and the combination of the following asie extensions: forESignature, forESeal, forWebAuthentication.
The X509 certificate must contain a public key. SHA1 of the public key of the X509 certificate: 'f66df8b148b3414301db8644e51805b75ecc0637'

Any X509 certificate within one digital identity component may have the attribute O within its SubjectName equal to the Trust Service Provider's Trade Name and this should be stated in the website pointed by the SchemeServiceDefinitionURI component. One of the TSP TradeName instances is included in one 'O' attribute in the cert. The following pair shows the contents of the O attribute and the name found in TSPTradeName: (O='TRUST2408', 'TRUST2408')

ServiceStatus.Check: The ServiceStatus value MUST be a valid value for the EU Regulation 910/2014 starting on 1st July 2016. Found ServiceStatus value: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/Svcstatus/recognisedatnationallevel

The ServiceStatus value MUST be a valid value for the service type. ServiceTypeIdentifier found value: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/PKC, ServiceStatus found value: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/Svcstatus/recognisedatnationallevel

StatusStartingTime.Check: The StatusStartingTime may be a time respect the checking time. If it is later than the checking time, it is an announced status change. StatusStartingTime found value: 2016-06-30T22:00:00Z

The StatusStartingTime MUST be greater than the time present in StatusStartingTime within the most recent ServiceHistoryInstance. StatusStartingTime this section is greater than StatusStartingTime in previous historical instance. Value in this section: 2016-06-30T22:00:00Z. Value in previous historic instance: 2010-03-02T23:00:00Z

URI.Check: The value of URI must be a non empty URI reference. The string for the URI is: "http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/SvcInfoExt/ForeSignatures"
The value of component URI must be a valid URI.Value found: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/SvcInfoExt/ForeSignatures
The value of the xml:lang attribute of URI is one of the values for European languages specified in IETF RFC 5646 and in clause E.1 of ETSI TS 119 612. Found value: "en"

ServiceInformation.Check: The ServiceType value http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/PKC and AdditionalServiceInformation extension value(s) MUST be coherent. According to ETSI TS 119 162v2.1.1, Annex J this service type may be further specified, when applicable, by means of an AdditionalServiceInformation extension including an appropriate combination of the values ForeSignatures, ForeSeals and ForWebSiteAuthentication. Found values for asie: [http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/SvcInfoExt/ForeSignatures]
The transition between statues MUST be one of the following: from EUDir to EUDir, from EUDir to EUDir or from EUReg to EUReg.
The value of StartusStartingTime in the first service section corresponding to the entry into force of EU Regulation MUST be the string "2016-06-30T22:00:00Z".

The transition of the status MUST be as specified in ETSI TS 119 612v2.1.1 Annex J. Transition from http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/Svcstatus/accredited to http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/Svcstatus/recognisedatnationallevel is correct according to Annex J (d)(iii) (1)/(2)

ServiceTypeIdentifier.Check: When the StatusStartingTime in an historic instance is previous to the entry into force of the EU Regulation 910/2014, then the type of service in the service section MUST be one of the standardized values supporting EC Directive 1999/93/EC. ServiceTypeIdentifier value found: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/PKC. StatusStartingTime value found: 2010-03-02T23:00:00Z

The value of the xml:lang attribute of Name is one of the values for European languages specified in IETF RFC 5646 and in clause E.1 of ETSI TS 119 612. Found value: "en"

X509SubjectName.Check: The component X509SubjectName must contain an SubjectName. Found value: "CN=TRUST2408 OCES Primary CA, O=TRUST2408, C=DK"
Any X509SubjectName element shall contain a value equal to the SubjectName of a certificate present in the ServiceDigitalIdentity parent component.

The content of the X509SKI component must be equal to the SubjectKeyIdentifier present in any X509 certificate within the digital identity. The SubjectKeyIdentifier of the certificate with Issuer: "C=DK,O=TRUST2408,CN=TRUST2408 OCES Primary CA". SubjectName: "C=DK,O=TRUST2408,CN=TRUST2408 OCES Primary CA". SerialNumber: 1267621891. Public Key's SHA1 digest: 'f66df8b148b3414301db8644e51805b75ecc0637' is the same as the content of this component

ServiceTypeIdentifier value found: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/PKC; ServiceStatus value found: http://uri.etsi.org/TrstSvc/TrustedList/Svcstatus/accredited

StatusStartingTime.Check: The StatusStartingTime may be a time respect the checking time. If it is later than the checking time, it is an announced status change. StatusStartingTime found value: 2010-03-02T23:00:00Z

Reference.Check: One of the ds:Reference elements MUST have an URI set to a value referencing the TrustServiceStatusList that envelopes the signature.

Transforms.Check: The ds:Transforms child of the ds:Reference element referencing the enveloping TrustServiceStatusList MUST contain TWO ds:Transform elements.

Transform.Check: The first ds:Transforms child of the ds:Reference element referencing the enveloping TrustServiceStatusList MUST have the Algorithm attribute set to: 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature'.
The second ds:Transforms child of the ds:Reference element referencing the enveloping TrustServiceStatusList MUST have the Algorithm attribute set to: 'http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n'.

Canonicalization.Check: The canonicalization MUST be set to: 'http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n'.

X509Data.Check: The ds:KeyInfo MUST have only ONE X509Certificate component.

X509Certificate.Check: The ds:KeyInfo MUST contain the signing certificate. Signing certificate details: Issuer: "CN=TRUST2408 OCES CA II, O=TRUST2408, C=DK". SubjectName: "CN=Thomas Vangsaa + SERIALNUMBER=CVR:34051178-RID:46593619, O=Digitaliseringsstyrelsen // CVR:34051178, C=DK". SerialNumber: 1400497981. Public Key's SHA1 digest: '090c5da43c847fd75b56c0fc190b8aa646a37ab1'
The signing certificate of the TL shall not be expired. Today's date: Tue Sep 25 13:14:51 CEST 2018. Expiration date: Sun Aug 27 14:42:33 CEST 2017

The signing certificate shall be issued by one of the following entities: the TSLO itself, a TSP listed in the TL, or a TSP within the same community. The Issuer is neither the TLSO itself nor one of the Services listed in the TL. It could well happen that the signing certificate has been issued by a TSP from other TL. Manual inspection is required as the TLCC does not incorporate facilities for implementing this check

The Organization attribute of the Subject field MUST match the valule of one of the values of SchemeOperatorName. The 'O' value that matched the scheme operator name(s) was: Digitaliseringsstyrelsen // CVR:34051178'.The scheme operator name(s) found are: 'Digitaliseringsstyrelsen // CVR:34051178', 'Danish Agency for Digitisation // CVR:34051178'
The Country attribute of the Subject field MUST match the value of one of the values of SchemeTerritory. Country in certificate: 'DK', country in SchemeTerritory: 'DK'

The signing certificate's KeyUsage extension shall have the value digitalSignature or nonRepudiation to the exclusion of any other KeyUsage value. Details: digitalSignature and nonRepudiation found. But also other values: 2 3
The signing certificate's ExtendedKeyUsage extension should be present containing the value id-tsl-kp-tslSigning.ExtendedKeyUsage is not present
The signing certificate's BasicConstraints extension shall indicate CA=false.

The signing certificate shall contain the SubjectKeyIdentifier extension and its value shall be computed with one of the first 2 methods specified in clause 4.2.1.2 of IETF RFC 5280. The SubjectKeyIdentifier in the certificate has been computed using method number 1: 160-bit SHA-1 hash of the value of the BIT STRING subjectPublicKey (excluding the tag, length, and number of unused bits). Hex values: 0414ad071924137d50505c154d1e8ce673976010db4b

SignatureValue.Check: The crytpographic verification of ds:SignatureValue with the public key within the signing certificate MUST succeed.

Signature.Check: The signing certificate MUST be protected by the signature. The xades:SigningCertificate property is present, contains a reference to the xades:SignedProperties and it is protected by the signature. The xades:SignedProperties element is actually referenced by ds:Reference number: 2
The TL signature MUST be either a XAdES-BES or a XAdES-EPES. The signature is a XAdES-BES
The signing certificate of the TL shall be listed in the EC List of Lists.
